meta.title: Noobly JS - Not Just Another Accelerator Framework

hero.title: Noobly JS
hero.subtitle: Not Just Another Accelerator Framework - Your AI-Powered Development Assistant

image.alt: NooblyJS Robot Assistant - Your AI-Powered Development Companion

features.title: AI-Enhanced Development
features.description: Built with intelligent automation and AI-powered assistance. Experience lightning-fast development cycles with your robot companion.

features.title: Modular Robot Architecture
features.description: Use only what you need with our flexible, plugin-based system. Build exactly what your project requires with robotic precision.

features.title: Smart Developer Experience
features.description: Intuitive APIs and excellent documentation for a smooth development experience. Built by robots, for humans.

services.title: Core Services
services.description: Explore our comprehensive suite of backend services

items.title: Caching Service
items.description: High-performance caching with Redis, Memcached, and in-memory providers for lightning-fast data access.

items.title: Filing Service
items.description: Comprehensive file management with local, FTP, and S3 storage options for secure file handling.

items.title: Logging Service
items.description: Advanced logging capabilities with console and file outputs for comprehensive application monitoring.

items.title: Measuring Service
items.description: Real-time metrics collection and analysis for performance insights and system optimization.

items.title: Notifying Service
items.description: Robust notification system with pub/sub messaging for real-time communication across services.

items.title: Queueing Service
items.description: Efficient task queueing with in-memory processing for handling background operations.

items.title: Scheduling Service
items.description: Cron-like task scheduling for automated processes and recurring operations.

items.title: Searching Service
items.description: Powerful search functionality with in-memory indexing for fast data retrieval and filtering.

items.title: Workflow Service
items.description: Step-based workflow orchestration for complex business processes and automation.

items.title: Working Service
items.description: Background task execution engine for processing intensive operations asynchronously.

items.title: Authentication Service
items.description: Secure user authentication and authorization with multiple providers including Passport.js and OAuth.

testimonial.text: Noobly JS and its robot companion have revolutionized our development process. What used to take weeks now takes days. The framework's intelligent automation and powerful features make it an indispensable tool for any serious developer.
testimonial.author: ‚Äî Sarah Chen, Lead Developer at RoboTech Corp

about.description: Not just another accelerator framework. Noobly JS is designed to empower developers with powerful tools and intuitive APIs for building modern web applications.

await data.store('user:1', userData);

items.question: What is Noobly JS?
items.answer: Noobly JS is a modular Node.js backend framework that provides pluggable core services for building scalable web applications quickly and efficiently.

items.question: Is Noobly JS free to use?
items.answer: Yes, Noobly JS is open-source and free to use for both personal and commercial projects. Check our license for more details.

items.question: How do I get started?
items.answer: Check out our documentation for a comprehensive quick start guide and examples.

items.question: Can I contribute to the project?
items.answer: Absolutely! We welcome contributions. Visit our GitHub repository to see how you can help improve Noobly JS.

items.question: Do you offer commercial support?
items.answer: Yes, we offer commercial support and consulting services. Contact us at business@nooblyjs.com for more information.

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.description: Get in touch with our team for support, questions, or business inquiries.
